title: Leaver buster
body:
Hi there

I have been place on leaver buster due to my modem cutting out in game. I do not think i deserve to be dealt this consequence for the 2 games i was dc as i was trying to get my internet sorted and get back into game. I understand if i were leaving on purpose but because of technical difficulties this punishment is not justified. Sorry i do not leave game if you can see probably ever since i started playing this game.
